creator: steven.mosley1@gmail.com
text:
When the first block in a table cell is an empty block i.e. <fo:block /> the
whole table will not be rendered. We are using empty blocks to force blank lines
in our generated PDF's. This previously worked in version 0.93

Two files are attached the error.fo has exhibits the problem ... the table isn't
rendered. works.fo has the first block changed to have "Any Text" and the table
will be rendered.

Created attachment 21258
File that exhibits the error
creator: steven.mosley1@gmail.com
steven.mosley1@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 21259
Fiel that doesn't have the error because the first block in the table contains some text

text:
Hi Steve,

This is a duplicate of bug #43405 which is fixed in the Trunk, so the fix will
be available in the next release.
Thanks for taking the time to report the bug, anyway.

Vincent
